summary: This document is a daily assignment roster for staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, August 3, 2019. It lists shift assignments, posts, and special assignments for correctional officers and other staff. The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of staffing on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC prior to his death.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as assigned to SHU (Special Housing Unit) and OT (Overtime) shifts on the roster.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Standard daily assignment roster detailing staff shifts, posts (including SHU, Control, Lobby, Visitation), and special assignments for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: MCC NEW YORK, NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 3, 2019.
The roster includes assignments for the Special Housing Unit (SHU), control rooms, lobby, visitation, and sanitation.
One staff member, Noel, T, is explicitly named and assigned to SHU and overtime shifts.
The document provides operational context for the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death in August 2019.
